name: 8th World Conference on Teaching and Education
content: Join us from June 6th to 8th in the beautiful city of Cambridge, United Kingdom, for the 8th World Conference on Teaching and Education. This premier academic event invites submissions on topics such as Teaching, Education, Learning, e-learning, and Language Education \_ ELT / FLT. Why You Should Attend: Abstract Book Publication: All accepted and registered abstracts will be published in the Conference Abstract Book, complete with an ISBN Number. Publication Opportunities: Full papers can be published in various Indexed International Journals, including SCOPUS, Web of Science, DOAJ, and more, or as a Book Chapter. Keynote Speakers: Gain insights from leading experts who will share their knowledge and innovative research. Virtual Presentation Option: If you can’t attend in person, apply to present virtually. Share your research and experience from anywhere and receive full event documentation. Explore Cambridge: Enjoy a complimentary city tour provided by the Organizing Committee. Experience the rich history and vibrant culture of Cambridge with a knowledgeable local guide. Key Features: Double Peer Review Process: Ensure your research is rigorously evaluated through our thorough peer review system. Flexible Registration Fees: Benefit from different registration fees across several registration rounds, making it easier to participate. Free Invitation Letter: Registered in-person attendees will receive a complimentary invitation letter to assist with visa applications. Networking and Collaboration: Engage with Peers: Connect with fellow educators, researchers, and professionals. Share ideas, foster collaborations, and build lasting relationships. Enhance Your Knowledge: Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in teaching and education through diverse presentations and discussions. Join Us in Cambridge: Don’t miss this incredible opportunity to be part of a vibrant community of scholars and practitioners. Submit your papers, share your research, and join us for an unforgettable experience at the 8th World Conference on Teaching and Education in Cambridge. Register Now! Visit our website for more information and to register. Let’s make this conference a landmark event in the field of teaching and education. We look forward to welcoming you to Cambridge!
